rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance hall with open space and natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.
Spacious living area incorporating Kerala design elements, featuring large windows for ample daylight.
Cozy dining space with Kerala motifs and traditional woodwork.
Modern yet traditional kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows for a well-lit workspace.
Guest room designed in Kerala style for comfortable stays.
Master bedroom featuring Kerala-style decor and floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light.
Third bedroom offering privacy and Kerala-inspired interiors.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom with traditional Kerala elements.

openings.description: Large traditional entrance door leading to the foyer and open courtyard.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the entrance hall for ample natural light and ventilation.
Large window openings providing a panoramic view of the garden.

rooms.description: Cozy study area with Kerala design and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Additional bedroom on the first floor in traditional Kerala style.
Guest bathroom with modern amenities and traditional touches.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala staircase connecting ground to first floor, designed for safety and aesthetics.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the study room offering views of the pool area.

rooms.description: Final bedroom on the second floor offering privacy and Kerala-inspired interiors.
Private bathroom for the fifth bedroom with traditional fixtures.

openings.description: Additional staircase connecting first and second floors, designed following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and enhanced Vastu compliance.
